languages.text: "Что?.." {n}Хейнрикс морщится от ваших слов.{/n} "Эта тварь не знала имя Лорд-инквизитора... значит... {name}. Ты жив{mf||а}! Слава Золотому Трону. Найди способ вытащить меня из этого гроба..."

traits.locale_text: "Что?.." {n}Хейнрикс морщится от ваших слов.{/n} "Эта тварь не знала имя Лорд-инквизитора... значит... {name}. Ты жив{mf||а}! Слава Золотому Трону. Найди способ вытащить меня из этого гроба..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "What?" {n}Heinrix winces at your words.{/n} "That monster couldn't have known the Lord Inquisitor's name... which means... {name}. You're alive. Thank the Golden Throne. Find a way to get me out of this coffin..."
languages.original_text: "Что?.." {n}Хейнрикс морщится от ваших слов.{/n} "Эта тварь не знала имя Лорд-инквизитора... значит... {name}. Ты жив{mf||а}! Слава Золотому Трону. Найди способ вытащить меня из этого гроба..."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix winces at your words.{/n} "That monster couldn't have known the Lord Inquisitor's name... which means... {name}. You're alive. Thank the Golden Throne. Find a way to get me out of this coffin..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「なに？」{n}その言葉にハインリックスは身震いする。{/n}「あの怪物はロード・インクィジターの名前…つまり…{name}だということを知らないはずだ。あなたは生きていた。黄金の玉座に感謝しなければ。俺をこの棺桶から出す方法を探してくれ…」
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix winces at your words.{/n} "That monster couldn't have known the Lord Inquisitor's name... which means... {name}. You're alive. Thank the Golden Throne. Find a way to get me out of this coffin..."

traits.locale_text: 「なに？」{n}その言葉にハインリックスは身震いする。{/n}「あの怪物はロード・インクィジターの名前…つまり…{name}だということを知らないはずだ。あなたは生きていた。黄金の玉座に感謝しなければ。俺をこの棺桶から出す方法を探してくれ…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “什么？”{n}海因里希听了你的话，皱起了眉头。{/n}“那头怪物不可能知道大审判官的名字……这意味着……{name}，你还活着，感谢黄金王座。想个办法，把我从这棺材里弄出来吧……”
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix winces at your words.{/n} "That monster couldn't have known the Lord Inquisitor's name... which means... {name}. You're alive. Thank the Golden Throne. Find a way to get me out of this coffin..."

traits.locale_text: “什么？”{n}海因里希听了你的话，皱起了眉头。{/n}“那个恶魔不可能知道审判长的名字……这意味着……{name}，你还活着，感谢黄金王座。想个办法，把我从这棺材里弄出来吧……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué?». {n}Heinrix se estremece ante tus palabras.{/n} «Ese monstruo no puede conocer el nombre del Lord Inquisidor... lo que significa... {name}. Sigue con vida. Gracias al Trono Dorado. Encuentre una manera de sacarme de este ataúd...».
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix winces at your words.{/n} "That monster couldn't have known the Lord Inquisitor's name... which means... {name}. You're alive. Thank the Golden Throne. Find a way to get me out of this coffin..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué?». {n}Heinrix se estremece ante tus palabras.{/n} «Ese demonio no puede conocer el nombre del Lord Inquisidor... lo que significa... {name}. Sigue con vida. Gracias al Trono Dorado. Encuentre una manera de sacarme de este ataúd...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Was?" {n}Heinrix verzieht bei deinen Worten das Gesicht.{/n} "Dieses Monster kann den Namen des Großinquisitors nicht gekannt haben ... Was bedeutet ... {name}. Ihr lebt. Dem Goldenen Thron sei Dank. Findet einen Weg, mich aus diesem Sarg zu befreien ..."
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix winces at your words.{/n} "That monster couldn't have known the Lord Inquisitor's name... which means... {name}. You're alive. Thank the Golden Throne. Find a way to get me out of this coffin..."

traits.locale_text: "Was?" {n}Heinrix verzieht bei deinen Worten das Gesicht.{/n} "Dieser Schurke kann den Namen des Großinquisitors nicht gekannt haben ... Was bedeutet ... {name}. Ihr lebt. Dem Goldenen Thron sei Dank. Findet einen Weg, mich aus diesem Sarg zu befreien ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tressaille.{/n} « Quoi ? Ce monstre ne pourrait pas connaître le nom du seigneur inquisiteur... ce qui veut dire que... {name}. Vous êtes en vie. Le Trône soit loué. Trouvez un moyen de me libérer de ce cercueil... »
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix winces at your words.{/n} "That monster couldn't have known the Lord Inquisitor's name... which means... {name}. You're alive. Thank the Golden Throne. Find a way to get me out of this coffin..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tressaille.{/n} « Quoi ? Ce démon ne pourrait pas connaître le nom du seigneur inquisiteur... ce qui veut dire que... {name}. Vous êtes en vie. Le Trône soit loué. Trouvez un moyen de me libérer de ce cercueil... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ne?" {n}Heinrix, dediklerini duyunca irkiliyor.{/n} "O canavar, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun adını bilemez... O hâlde... {name}. Yaşıyorsun. Altın Taht'a şükürler olsun. Beni bu tabuttan çıkarmanın bir yolunu bul..."
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix winces at your words.{/n} "That monster couldn't have known the Lord Inquisitor's name... which means... {name}. You're alive. Thank the Golden Throne. Find a way to get me out of this coffin..."

traits.locale_text: "Ne?" {n}Heinrix dediklerini duyunca irkiliyor.{/n} "O canavar Lord Engizisyoncu'nun adını bilemez... O hâlde... {name}. Yaşıyorsun. Altın Taht'a şükürler olsun. Beni bu tabuttan çıkarmanın bir yolunu bul..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
